overview: A collection of nine complete films unrelated loops from Buckshot/Colt idealizing the above-average-sized man.  All Male Casts! Films included being “Service Entry,” “Overload,” “Muscle Beach,” “Hot Cop,” “Blood, Sweat & Beers,” “Shack Up,” “Hammerhead,” “Grease Monkies” and “House Boat.”
title: The Best of Colt Films 5 & 6
